page.topic: Set Image File Name in Linked Image Field

section.title: Overview
section.description: The Set Image File Name in Linked Image Field action specifies the image filename for a linked image field.

step.description: Make a selection in the Set the filename for an Image File Reference filed in which window? field. This field will be grayed out unless this action is based on a Form or Browse. The choices are:
Select one of the listed forms or browses.
In the Object Name field select a text field on the form or browse. Click the Value icon to select the field that contains the image file reference.
Optionally, check the Prompt for Image Filename at run-time?
In the Image Filename field type a name, select a file with the browse button, or enter an expression to specify where to get the file.
Optionally modify the comment that describes the action.
